review: Doctor Shankar is amazing. He is just thorough in diagnosing the problem and gives a genuine feedback. Doctor to be seen for any orthopedic problems.

My brother(sachin rao) had a MAJOR fracture on his left hand(wrist).Mr.shankar sir explained us the problem briefly and treated my brother EXCELLENTLY.
THANK YOU SO MUCH DR.SHANKAR FROM OUR FAMILY AND FRIENDS.... ðŸ˜‡

The ' Fracture and Orthopaedic 'clinic did not keep up time. I made a booking for 5:30 PM and when I went there, they said it would take 1-1.5 hours to get a consultation  with the doctor. I was disappointed and I left as not everyone always got time to wait. I can understand delays of 15-30 minutes when advanced booking is made, beyond that- they should have informed earlier.

I visited the doctor for my shoulder pain.I  have  notseen such an impatient  doctor who does not want to listen to the patient,he did not even examine but instead asked to take some  pain killer.We were really hurt.I  would not recommend  this doctor  to any one.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Shankar took a lot of time to explain each and every aspect of my mother's spinal problem to us. He was hearing us out and also patiently replying to all our questions /queries. I have happy that my mother is under treatment with him.
Qualified, insightful & imparts sufficient time to the patient & family. Follow up appointments are given due attention too.

review:
**** ** *** **** **..I have recommended many and will also do in future...
I have been visiting DrShankar for past 10 years whenever required and everytime he delivers the best result with proper quality and service

Shankar doctor is vary good *********
Thanks of lot sir. We are very happy today for your giving appointment.
